tool_description: UGPROXY Service | Proxy List - Residential Proxy - Rotating IP's Proxy Service
name: UGPROXY
title: UGPROXY

api_list.name: Rotating Proxy API
api_list.description: API will respond with a random proxy currently active in the pool upon each request.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ugproxy.p.rapidapi.com/rapidapi/rotating-proxy"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ugproxy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
